parameters.query:
SELECT created_at,caseid, customer, cid, sentiment, strength, confidence
FROM public.sentiment_results
WHERE customer ILIKE '%' || '{{ $json.Customer }}%' 
  AND created_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '20 days';

SELECT created_at, customer, cid, sentiment, strength, confidence
FROM public.sentiment_results
WHERE customer ILIKE '%' || '{{ $json.Customer }}%' 
  AND created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours';
